sentences.cn: 他开始厌恶占上风,厌恶不受羁绊的自由.

sentences.en: It was autonomy which this humane and self - sufficient man seemed to embody.

sentences.en: This would have undermined our deliberate strategy of using trade selectively to encourage political autonomy.
